title: ImageSharpen
name: ImageSharpen
description: Sharpens a image by using the unsharp mask filter.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

arguments.name: gain
arguments.description:
Gain values can be integers or real numbers. The default value is 1.0.
The value determines whether the image is blurred or sharpened:
- if > 0, the image is sharpened
- if = 0, no effect
- if < 0, the image is blurred
